pickOne: **Chaotic** - Free someone from literal or figurative bonds.
**Good** - Endanger yourself to combat an unnatural threat.
**Neutral** - Help an animal or spirit of the wild.

title: Race
pickOne: Elf - When you **Undertake A Perilous Journey** through wilderness whatever job you take you suceed as if you rolled a 10+.
Human - When you **Make Camp** in a dungeon or city, you don't need to consume a ration.

title: Animal Companion
description: You have a supernatural connection with a loyal animal. You can't talk to it per se but it always acts as you wish it to.

title: Hunt & Track (+WIS)
description: When you **follow a trail of clues left behind by passing creatures**, roll+WIS.

outcomes.text: You follow the creature's trail until there's a significant change in its direction or mode of travel, and choose 1:
bullets: Gain a useful bit of information about your quarry, the GM will tell you what
Determine what caused the trail to end

outcomes.text: You follow the creature's trail until there's a significant change in its direction or mode of travel.

title: Called Shot
description: When you **attack a defenseless or surprised enemy at range**, you can choose to deal your damage or name your target and roll+DEX.

outcomes.text: They do nothing but stand and drool for a few moments.

title: Command
description: When you **work with your animal companion on something it's trained in**:

bullets: and you attack the same target, add its *ferocity* to your damage
and you track, add its *cunning* to your roll
and you take damage, add its *armor* to your *armor*
and you **Discern Realities**, add its *cunning* to your roll
and you **Parley**, add its *cunning* to your roll
and someone Interferes with you, add its *instinct* to their roll
